bibl.title: Grade report for Jesse W. Lazear, June 4, 1887

div1.p: This is a report of Lazear's grades at Johns Hopkins University.

div1.head: Grade report for Jesse W. Lazear, June 4, 1887
div1.p:
I am instructed by the Board of Collegiate Advisers to inform you that our
records at the close of this academic year show that:

J. W. Lazear has pursued the following
courses:-
div1.closer:
Ira Remsen ADVISER. Baltimore, June 4 1887.
To
Thos. C. Lazear, Esq.
Guardian
